actionTemplate.title: Standard Brow
steps: Mark brow head, arch, and tail to set length and height
Draw the lower line first, then the upper line to meet the tail
Fill lightly: softer at the front, deeper toward the tail
Brush through to blend and follow hair direction
Clean edges with concealer for a crisp brow line

rationaleTemplate: A universal shape that instantly sharpens the face.
Mapping + gradient keeps brows natural, not blocky.
